name: socks by its cover
description:
I made 10 stories based on the first 10 submissions at the "My Famicase Exhibition 2019" in sok-stories an extremely accessible tool. 

You only need to click on an image and it will take you to the site where you can play it with your mouse or your fingers. PS: I know that the title is grammatically incorrect.

#1 Outdoor in Door based on https://famicase.com/19/softs/001.html

#2 Solar Sea of Love based on https://famicase.com/19/softs/002.html

#3 Zero G based on https://famicase.com/19/softs/003.html

#4 Colorzapper based on https://famicase.com/19/softs/004.html

#5 dark day dream based on https://famicase.com/19/softs/005.html

#6 OK POP based on https://famicase.com/19/softs/006.html

#7 RPGame based on https://famicase.com/19/softs/007.html

#8 waiting based on https://famicase.com/19/softs/008.html

#9 Rally based on https://famicase.com/19/softs/009.html

#10 AGBIC 19 based on https://famicase.com/19/softs/010.html
